name: A Man With a Rocket
description:
Just a game about a man with a rocket, can you win?

This is a game that will challenge you, there are five stages that keep increasing in difficulty. Can you reach the end?

How to play
  • Click in the direction you want to thrust the rocket.
  • Don't explode...
More about the game

This is an entry for the Godot Wild Jam #5 One control theme.

Software used:

  • Godot 3.0.6
  • Sunvox
  • Aseprite

Explosion sprites from Opengameart.org.
